Package pentago.game

Class PentagoBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.game.PentagoBoard
  • public class PentagoBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Pentago game logic

      static int DIM
      Constant that holds the dimension of the PentagoBoard field.

      PentagoBoard()

      Checks whether specific mark is a winner on the board.
      void makeAutomatedMove​(Move move)
      Based on the amount of moves a move with the correct mark is played, therefore allowing for making a move without knowing who is playing.

      Makes a valid move on the Pentago board with a given mark for the move.

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(Rotation rotation)
        Rotation function takes the row and col offset of the quadrant it is going to rotate and with a help of a bit of math it positions itself correctly to rotate the quadrant by either 90 degrees to the right or left.
        Parameters:
        rotation - Rotation object with quadrant and direction

      • getRowOffset

        public int getRowOffset​(Quadrant quadrant)
        Get the row offset for each quadrant.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the row index of the first field in the quadrant

      • getColOffset

        public int getColOffset​(Quadrant quadrant)
        Get the column offset for each quadrant (indicates the col index of the first field in the quadrant).
        Parameters:
        quadrant - The quadrant that we want to get the column offset of
        Returns:
        the row index of the first field in the quadrant
